content: pdf digital download crochet pattern for baby hat booties and blanket crochet pattern includes a full video tutorial this is an intermediate design written in standard american terms yarn requirements craftsy sprightly acrylic worsted yarn - 100% acrylic 201yds/184m /3 5oz/100g shown in ecru mc suede a misty pink b misty purple c yarn may be purchased at our affiliate link here https //www shareasale com/m-pr cfm merchantid=29190&userid=1458588&productid=666331033 hat sizes newborn 2wks-3mth 3-6mth 6-9mth 9-12mth 12-18mth 18-24mth bootie sizes 0-3mth 3-6mth 6-12mth 12-18mth 18-24mth 1 skein mc small amounts of a-c blanket size 32 x 40 mc 2 a 2 b 2 c 2 crochet hook requirements hat/blanket us i/9 5 5mm or size needed to obtain gauge booties us 7 4 5mm or size needed to obtain gauge additional supplies yarn needle wooden buttons - 6 20mm 1 25mm personalized garment tags optional you are welcome to sell finished product from this design please reference mj s off the hook as designer you must use your own photos to sell your work all my images are copyright protected and cannot be used to sell your items due to the nature of patterns there are no returns or refunds all sales are final *hat and bootie video may only be viewed on www mjsoffthehookdesigns com videos must be purchased using coupon code provided in pattern separate login from ravelry is required account for mjsoffthehookdesigns com is made when making the purchase
